articles.title: Apple can resume selling latest watches as sales ban is temporarily paused - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The appeals court has put a stay on the ban till January 12, 2024. Apple was banned from selling Apple Watches in the US featuring SpO2 (blood oxygen...
articles.content: Apple was banned from selling Apple Watches in the US featuring SpO2 (blood oxygen level) sensors following a patent dispute with medical technology company Masimo. Apple appealed against this order … [+977 chars]

articles.author: Natalie Grover, Noah Browning
articles.title: Oil prices slide as Red Sea transport disruptions ease - Reuters
articles.description: Oil prices fell more than 1% on Thursday as concerns eased about shipping disruptions along the Red Sea route, even as tensions in the Middle East continue to fester.
articles.content:
LONDON, Dec 28 (Reuters) - Oil prices fell more than 1% on Thursday as concerns eased about shipping disruptions along the Red Sea route, even as tensions in the Middle East continue to fester.
